name: Pull Yourself Together (Triangle, exophagious)
description:
Starting the game as a severed toe, you must journey forth to find your missing body parts.  During the search you will fight evil blob monsters and experience groovy music and cut scenes!

Find all your lost body parts to win the game!

Play in FULLSCREEN mode for the best experience.

Doesn't appear to be working on Safari, (sorry about that).

CREATED BY Joe Darcy (Triangle) and Rosie Campbell (exophagious)

Coding,  music and animation: Joe Darcy

Artwork: Rosie Campbell

CONTROLS

A and D = left and right

SPACEBAR = attack
